ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.title: &9Blue Skies&r[--&9蔚蓝天空&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests0.sub: Living a simple life....[--过着简单的生活...--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests0.des: Somewhere in the Overworld, you'll find two simple homes.[--在主世界的某个地方,你会找到两个简单的家。--]
The &aGatekeeper&r lives here, and will trade you a few items to get you started in the mod.[--&a守门人&r住在这里,并将交易一些物品来让你开始mod.--]
The Gatekeeper knows all about the dimensions of Blue Skies. As you journey through the mod, your &9Blue Journal&r will expand to help guide you.[--守门人了解蔚蓝天空的所有维度。当你通过mod时,你的&9蓝色日记&r会扩展来帮助你指南.--]
He'll also trade more items as you advance through the dimensions, so keep an eye out![--随着你跨维度,他也会交易更多的物品,所以请留意!--]
Acquire the &9Blue Journal&r. You'll also need the Zeal Lighter in the next quest. [--获得&9蓝色日记&r。在下一个任务中,你还需要Zeal Lighter.--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests1.des: Within the Gatekeeper's smaller house, you might stumble upon what looks to be a broken portal.[--在守门人的小屋里,你可能会发现一个看起来被破坏的传送门。--]
Acquire a &6Zeal Lighter&r and use it to light the portal. [--获得一个&6Zeal Lighter&r并用它来点亮传送门.--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests2.des: It seems you have stumbled your way into the world of &9Everbright&r.[--看起来你迷路了,来到了&9永昼之地&r的世界。--]
This is the realm of eternal day and frigid temps. You'll find several large beasts, ethereal mobs, and even a few bosses. [--这是永恒的白天和寒冷的节日之地。你会发现几个大野兽,实体生物,甚至几个Boss。--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests3.des: Welcome to the world of &6Everdawn&r, the world where the sun is forever rising.[--欢迎来到&6精灵之地&r,太阳永昼之地。--]
This is a warm, humid world where insects and reptiles flourish.[--这是一个温暖、潮湿的世界,昆虫和爬行者在此繁育。--]
Are you prepared for the poison and fire?[--你准备好接受毒和火了吗?--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests4.tit: Something isn't quite right.....[--有什么东西不太对劲...--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests4.des: Your Overworldly tools have no power here.[--你主世界的工具在这里没有电力.--]
You'll want to quickly make a new pickaxe from the woods around you if you want to get anywhere in Blue Skies.[--如果你想在蔚蓝天空中找到任何地方,你就会想从周围的森林里快速制作新的镐子。--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests4.tas: Any Blue Skies Wooden Pickaxe[--任意蓝色天空木镐--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests5.tit: A New Mining Adventure[--新的挖矿冒险--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests5.sub: And it's pretty dark.[--它非常黑暗。--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests5.des: If you want to master the lands of Blue Skies, you'll need to craft a new weapon, the &6Spear&r.[--如果你想控制蔚蓝之地,你需要制作新的武器,&6矛&r.--]
To make these, we'll need some Moonstone to get started. Head to the caverns and find you some ores![--要制作这些,我们需要一些月长石才能开始。前往洞穴为你找到一些矿石!--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests6.sub: First Wood, then Stone... then.. what?[--先是原木,然后是石头...然后...什么?--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests6.des: Just like in the Overworld, Wooden tools won't get you very far.[--就像主世界一样,木制工具不会让你走很远.--]
Head underground and grab some stone. You'll want to make yourself a new pickaxe, then we can get started with the new ores.[--前往地下并获得一些石头。你会想做个新的镐,然后我们就可以开始新的矿石了。--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests6.tas: Blue Skies Stone Pickaxe[--蔚蓝天空石镐--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests7.tit: Making a New Weapon[--制作新武器--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests7.des: The &6Spear&r is the favored weapon in Blue Skies. It can be enchanted, and works as a nice ranged weapon for the enemies you'll face.[--&6矛&r是蔚蓝天空中的优先武器。它可以被附魔,并为你将面对的敌人提供很好的远程武器。--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests8.des: Pyrope means Speed in the language of Blue Skies.[--榴石在蔚蓝天空中代表速度.--]
These tools are weak, but fast.[--这些工具很弱,但速度很快。--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests9.des: As we go further in the caverns of Blue Skies, we'll run into &9Aquite Ore&r.[--当你在蔚蓝之空洞穴中走得更远时,你会发现&9水晶矿石&r.--]
Mine yourself enough to make you some starter tools. You'll need these to mine the tougher Blue Skies ores.[--挖掘自己足够让你获得一些入门工具了。你需要这些来开采更坚固的蓝空矿石。--]
From here, it is recommended to find some of the better materials to make some weapons and armor.[--从这里开始,建议找到一些更好的材料来制作一些武器和盔甲。--]
Note: ATM Weapons still pack a punch.[--注意:ATM武器仍然会装填一击。--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests10.de: The green gemstone &eDiopside&r is a very tough metal that packs a punch, but is on the slower side. This is great for weapons![--绿色宝石&e透辉石&r是一个非常坚硬的金属,会打粉,但速度更慢。这对武器来说很好!--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests11.de: Ventium is a red metal found in most non-mountainous biomes in Everbright.[--是一种红色金属,在永昼之地大多数非登山生物群系中发现。--]
It's basically Iron, but can only be used to make shears, buckets, and the &6Tool Box&r.[--它基本上是铁制的,但只能用来制作剪刀、桶和&6工具箱&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests12.de: Falsite Ore can be found inside the non-mountainous biomes of Everbright.[--熔岩矿石可以在永昼之地的非登山生物群系中找到。--]
This ingot is used to strengthen the durability of almost any tool using the tool box.[--该锭用于使用工具箱增强几乎任何工具的耐久性。--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests13.de: This is the Diamond of Blue Skies. [--这是蔚蓝天空的钻石。--]

While Diopside is more durable and hits harder, Charoite is faster and is lighter overall. Tools made from Charoite can mine anything in Blue Skies.[--透辉石更耐用,更难击中,但紫龙晶速度更快,总体更轻。紫龙晶制作的工具可以在蔚蓝天空中开采任何东西。--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests14.de: Found only within the Crystal Dunes.[--只能在水晶沙丘中找到。--]
Tools made from this ingot will come with &6Auto-Smelt&r.[--用这个锭制成的工具会带&6自动冶炼&r来.--]
This can also be used to make the &6Horizonite Forge&r.[--这也可以用来制作&6火龙锻炉&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests15.de: This is used to upgrade and enchance tools from Blue Skies.[--用于升级和增强蔚蓝天空的工具。--]

You can use Falsite to increase the durability of a tool, or you can use any stick from the mod to swap out on a tool. Yes, different wood types have different uses.[--你可以使用falite来增加工具的耐久性,也可以使用mod中的任何手杖来切换工具。是的,不同的木材类型有不同的用途。--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests16.de: Ever wanted a forge that just smelts things without fuel?[--是否想要一个不消耗燃料就烧东西的锻造炉?--]

Me too. Technically, this does need a \"fuel\" per-se. It has a charge, and can be recharged using Sunstone or anything made from Horizonite.[--我也有。从技术上讲,这每秒都需要一个“燃料”。它有一个充能,并且可以使用日长石或用地辉石制成的任何东西进行充电。--]
The forge must be empty to recharge.[--熔炉必须是空的才能充电.--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests17.de: This is a lantern that prevents hostile spawns within a large radius. [--这是一个防止在大半径内生成敌对生物的灯笼。--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests18.de: Ventium can be used to make Shears and a bucket.[--可用于制作剪刀和桶。--]
The bucket can pick up the underwater mobs in Blue Skies.[--桶可以在蔚蓝天空中捡起水下生物。--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests19.de: Whether you started in Everbright or Everdawn, you'll want to search for a tower structure. There are images for them in the next quests. This is where you find your first boss.[--无论是在永昼之地还是恒晓之地,你都需要寻找一个塔结构。在下一个任务中有他们的图像。这是你找到第一个Boss的地方。--]

In the smaller parts of the tower, you'll fight for the loot and acquire some &6Blinding Dungeon Keys&r. Deep within the dungeon, there will be a doorway with a lock on it. Use 4 of the Blinding Dungeon Keys to unlock the boss fight.[--在塔的小部分,你会为战利品战斗,并获得一些&6闪闪发光的地牢钥匙&r。在地牢深处,有一个门,上面有一个锁。使用4个致盲地牢钥匙解锁Boss的战斗。--]
Note: The boss will drop an Arc upon defeat. These can be equipped in a special tab in your inventory. There are 4 Arcs in total.[--注意:Boss击败后会掉落一个刻印。这些可以安装在您的库存中的特殊选项卡中。总共有4个刻印。--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests20.de: In Blue Skies, there are 4 bosses to defeat and several dungeons to explore.[--在蔚蓝天空中,有4个Boss可以击败,几个地牢可以探索.--]

You can find random \"tunnels\" that lead down into dungeon rooms. These will spawn in Armored Frost Spirits to kill. Collect a few of these for Souls![--你可以找到随机的“隧道”,它们会引导下到地牢室。它们会在盔甲霜灵中生成来杀死。收集一些这些给灵魂!--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests21.su: The Guardian of the Everbright Tower[--永昼之塔的守护者--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests21.de: Deep within the Tower of Everbright, you'll find the Summoner.[--在永昼之塔深处,你会发现召唤者。--]
This boss will use lightning, energy attacks, and of course his summoned golem guards to protect the tower.[--这个Boss会使用闪电、能量攻击,当然还有他召唤的傀儡守卫来保护塔。--]
Can you best the Summoner?[--你能最好的召唤师吗?--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests22.su: The Guardian of the Everdawn Tower[--恒晓之塔守护者--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests22.de: In the Everdawn Tower, you'll find the Alchemist boss fight. Collect some Blinding Dungeon Keys to unlock the fight![--在恒晓之塔中,你会发现炼金师Boss的战斗。收集一些致盲地牢钥匙来解锁战斗!--]
Prepare to be hit with potions, as well as fighting the minions of the Alchemist.[--准备好被药水击中,并且与炼金师的仆从战斗.--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests23.su: The Boss of the Nature Dungeon[--自然地牢之王--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests23.de: You'll find the Nature's Dungeon within Everbright. You can't miss it, it's huge.[--你会在永昼之地找到自然地牢。你不会错失它,它非常大。--]
Gather some Nature Dungeon Keys within the maze of the structure to unlock the boss fight, and CHOP him down![--在结构的迷宫中收集一些自然钥匙来解锁Boss的战斗,然后砍倒他!--]
Note: You can trade with the Gatekeeper in case you can't find all of the keys, but only after you right click the gate for the boss fight.[--注意:你可以与守门人交易,如果你找不到所有的钥匙,但只有在你右键单击门进行Boss战斗之后。--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests24.su: The Boss of the Poison Dungeon[--毒之地牢之王--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests24.de: Note: If you are arachnophobic, this might not be the fight for you. [--注意:如果你是arachnobree,这可能不是战斗。--]
Within Everdawn, there will be a giant dead tree with a bunch of spider webs covering it.[--在永昼之地,将有一个巨大的枯死树,里面有一堆蜘蛛网。--]
Gather some Poison Dungeon Keys within to unlock the final boss fight![--在内部收集一些毒源钥匙来解锁最终的Boss战斗!--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests25.de: Increases movement speed.[--提高移动速度。--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests26.de: Grants invisibility when sneaking.[--潜行时隐身。--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests27.su: Drops from the Starlit Crusher's Loot Bag[--从星荧粉碎者战利品袋中掉落--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests28.su: Drops from the Arachnarch's Loot Bag[--从幽咽蛛王战利品袋中掉落--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests28.de: Increases damage done when poisoned.[--增加中毒时的伤害。--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests29.su: Drops from the Arachnarch's Loot Bag[--从幽咽蛛王战利品袋中掉落--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests30.su: Drops from the Arachnarch's Loot Bag[--从幽咽蛛王战利品袋中掉落--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests31.su: Drops from the Starlit Crusher's Loot Bag[--从星荧粉碎者战利品袋中掉落--]
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests31.de: Increases max hearts.[--增加最大生命值.--]
You will also need this to craft the Dragon Soul, which is needed for the ATM star.[--您还需要这个来制作龙魂,这是ATM之星所需的。--]
